body:
Perhaps say "serialized" rather than "stored". "stored" is a bit ambiguous because "stored" could mean in memory and in memory the floats are now in the host byte order. Same below.

(I guess we need to add some byte swapping code to ToProto but not in this CL.)

body_text:
Perhaps say "serialized" rather than "stored". "stored" is a bit ambiguous because "stored" could mean in memory and in memory the floats are now in the host byte order. Same below.
(I guess we need to add some byte swapping code to ToProto but not in this CL.)
